records.context_note: Migrant entered Albania irregularly, was apprehended by Albanian police, fingerprinted, detained overnight, and then pushed back to Greece from an abandoned area near a BCP.
records.evidence_quote: On the 5 February 2022, after entering irregularly the Albanian territory via [redacted] area, the migrant was travelling alone towards this area. Around [redacted] on that day the Albanian police found him and brought him to a service car. Afterwards he was escorted to the detention centre [redacted] indicated by the migrant), where he spent the night. On the same day, on 5 February 2022, the Albanian authorities took his fingerprints, as well as a profile picture, and the migrant filled and signed some forms. The next day, around [redacted] in the morning, the Albanian authorities brought them to an abandoned area [redacted] (the migrant pointed the exact location on a map) 5 minutes' walk close to the BCP, and then pushed him back to Greece.

records.context_note: Apprehension of 16 migrants by Albanian and Frontex officers. Allegations of excessive force (kick) by Albanian officer and previous pushbacks to Greece. FRO notes consistency with other SIRs regarding pushbacks.
records.evidence_quote: On 14 June 2022, the Frontex [redacted] documented the apprehension of a group of 16 migrants by one Albanian and one Frontex [redacted]. During the apprehension, the [redacted] an instance of potential use of excessive force by the Albanian officer in form of a kick. In addition, other migrants apprehended by the same team few hours earlier had claimed that they had been apprehended in the same area on 11 June 2022 by the Albanian authorities who had subsequently escorted them to the border with Greece.

records.context_note: Migrants apprehended by Albanian Police, not informed about asylum, not registered/fingerprinted, and allegedly forced to cross to Greece near Kakavia. FRO notes consistency with other pushback allegations.
records.evidence_quote: A migrant claimed that he entered illegally the Albanian territory on 11 June 2022 with a group of migrants. According to his account, after hiding in the forest for four consecutive days, seven of them were apprehended by the Albanian Police on 15 June 2022 in the area of [redacted]. Reportedly, the migrants were not informed about asylum procedures. He also claimed they hadn't been registered or fingerprinted and that two days later, on 17 June 2022, they were allegedly forced to take the path leading to the Greek border by Albanian Police officers.

records.context_note: Migrants entered Albania, were apprehended by Albanian Police, registered/fingerprinted, but not informed about asylum. Allegedly forced to cross to Greece and later apprehended by Greek authorities and transported to Delvinaki. FRO notes consistency with other pushback allegations.
records.evidence_quote: A man claimed that he entered illegally the Albanian territory with a group of 12 migrants. According to his account, he was dropped off by smugglers near the border line between Albania and Greece on the evening of 17.06.2022 and 10 hours later he crossed into the Albanian territory. He said that after four (4) days of walking (namely on 21.06.2022), they had been apprehended by Albanian Police officers and brought to a police station. Allegedly, the migrants were registered and fingerprinted but they were not informed about asylum procedures. The migrant also stated that on 21.06.2022 at 23:00 the Albanian police officers had forced them to take the path leading to the Greek border and after walking for one (1) hour they had been apprehended by Greek law enforcement officers. Reportedly, on 22.06.2022 the whole group was transported to Delvinaki (Greece).

records.context_note: Migrants entered Albania, apprehended by Albanian Police, alleged theft of 300 EUR, forced to take path to Greek border. Some returned to Albania, others continued to Greece and were apprehended by Greek authorities. FRO notes consistency with other pushback allegations.
records.evidence_quote: A man claimed that he had entered illegally the Albanian territory on 22 July 2022 with a group of 11 migrants. According to his account, after walking for two consecutive days, they were apprehended by the Albanian Police on 23 July 2022, [redacted]. Reportedly, law enforcement officers checked their belongings and stole 300 EUR from them. The migrant said that afterwards they were taken to an unknown location, possibly near [redacted] and that they were forced to take the path leading to the Greek border.
